description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.YMGOKoZtKgJqIsAD]{Mechanic Trick}

Your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.uWZ3LvxQ3yezLB4j]{Custom Rig (Ex)} can exercise delicate control over your vehicle, which gains an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.dXoXgaKcx2ZfBD4M.JournalEntryPage.UajK3gQtuf1CMz2y]{Autopilot} function (Core Rulebook 280) with a Piloting bonus equal to 4 + 1-1/2 the vehicleâ€™s item level. You can use your custom rig control the autopilot at a range of 500 feet, allowing you to engage, disengage, or enter coordinates for the autopilot as if you were in the vehicle. This range increases to 5 miles if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.JQiKFSMXkqLMW98N]{Expert Rig (Ex)} ability, 50 miles if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.NtHGqPauPZauV7rc]{Advanced Rig (Ex)} ability, and has a planetary range if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.GLFInMDKp2fLRpsG]{Superior Rig (Ex)} ability.

You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.lOB5gR1uyuadv0kI]{Experimental Vehicle (Ex)} class feature to choose this trick.
